title: Documentary of achievement
brief_description: The story of the development of the South African Iron and Steel Industrial Corporation. The film illustrates the growth of the vast iron and steel company and shows the part it has played in the development of South Africa through two generations in both peace and war. Contains excellent footage of construction of vehicles and ammunition for the war and some spectacular dangerous footage as well.
